Text:
If this program is installed for all 

users,you need to go to that user's(or all 

the user's desktops) desktop and run the 

reg patch there before you run the ashampoo 

program for that user.

If you don't, you're going to get a trial 

program popup window for that user.

Is it just me?

"REG PATCH" is missing... no  S/N  either?

Pirate-555
